tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
tokens.translation: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
tokens.translation: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style

tokens.translation: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style

tokens.resolved_gloss: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity
tokens.translation: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity

tokens.resolved_gloss: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity
tokens.translation: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity

tokens.resolved_gloss: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
tokens.translation: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
